The '''Vraelen''' were the [[elven]] names for two stars.{{cite book/Elminster in Myth Drannor|77|8}}
document_data.History: In the {{yearlinkName|241}}, before his death, [[Delmuth Echorn]] had nearly completed a ''[[lesser flith]]'' which still lacked two diamonds for the Vraelen.
